mission.title: What did we set out for?
mission.description: Tüm Trading was founded by a group of people with trading experience in different geographies. Providing consultancy services to the leading companies of the business world, Tüm Trading aims to ensure the successful conclusion of all regional and global commercial operations with its knowledgeable, talented, and experienced human resources.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: Our specialists are expected to possess strong analytical skills, efficient industrial manufacturing, and access to a viewpoint that examines stagnation's root causes and promotes transformation. Our goal is to assist businesses in realizing their full potential and emerging as industry leaders by providing a broad model of collaboration across all organizational levels in the commercial enterprises they support.

qualityPolicy.title: Quality Policy
qualityPolicy.intro: Tüm Trading bases all of its operations on "quality-oriented" labor. In keeping with this approach:

points.leadership: Advancing company owners and entrepreneurs to a position of leadership and innovation in their industries
points.satisfaction: To guarantee the contentment of every partner in the solution, particularly our staff
points.development: To direct sustainable development, efficient resource use, and ongoing progress
points.innovation: To encourage and support innovation and entrepreneurship
points.compliance: To conduct business in compliance with applicable laws and worldwide management standards

honesty.title: A. Honesty
honesty.description: Our main principles in all of our commercial dealings and interpersonal interactions are honesty and integrity. We conduct ourselves with honesty and integrity toward all of our stakeholders, including our employees.

privacy.title: B. Privacy
privacy.description1: Confidential and proprietary information comprises trade secrets, financial and other information that hasn't been made public yet, information about personnel's personal rights, and information that falls under the purview of "confidentiality agreements" signed with third parties. It also includes information that belongs to Tüm Group Companies that might put them at a competitive disadvantage. As staff members of Tüm Group, we take precautions to safeguard the personal information of our clients, partners, and other pertinent parties.
privacy.description2: It is absolutely unacceptable for us to obtain any financial benefit by disclosing any private information owned by Tüm Group Companies, including trading shares on stock markets. We do not take with us any confidential documents, projects, policies, or other information that we are required to have because of our work when we leave our organization.

responsibilities.title: D. Our Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: In addition to our legal obligations, we make sure to meet our following responsibilities towards our competitors, society, mankind, and our firm. These responsibilities include those towards our customers, employees, shareholders, suppliers, and business partners.

legal.title: 1. Our Legal Responsibilities
legal.description: We conduct all of our present business both domestically and internationally in accordance with the rules of the Republic of Turkey and international law. We also promptly and accurately supply legal regulatory bodies and organizations with information that is clear, comprehensive, and correct.

customers.title: 2. Our Responsibilities Towards Our Customers
customers.description: We have a proactive strategy that prioritizes client satisfaction and allows us to promptly and accurately address our clients' needs and requests. We meet our deadlines and provide our services as agreed upon; we deal with our clients in accordance with the principles of decency, fairness, equality, and civility.

healthSafety.title: Health and Safety Policy
healthSafety.intro: Tüm Trading strives to offer a safe and healthy working environment for all of its operations. In keeping with this objective, we commit to:

points.workforce: Creating a healthy workforce and population
points.prevention: Implementing essential procedures for preventing workplace accidents and occupational ailments
points.assessment: Carrying out risk assessments with staff participation to attain suitable risk levels
points.participation: Ensuring participation from all organizational levels in enhancing occupational health and safety procedures
points.culture: Fostering a culture of workplace health and safety
points.compliance: Complying with applicable laws and regulations for occupational health and safety
points.proactive: Taking a proactive stance toward occupational health and safety while boosting productivity
points.training: Maintaining training programs for staff, visitors, interns, and subcontractor personnel
